edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries
Class CommonArgumentDisplay

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries.CommonArgumentDisplay

public class CommonArgumentDisplay
extends java.lang.Object

The common argument display class displays a table of common arguments. This was written using the TableViewer example from the Eclipse Corner article about creating a table viewer. See the tasks package for more information. This is just a table though, not a table viewer.
